name: Signal Explorer
description:
Transmission has been a part of our daily lives. Particularly the ones that we do with mobile technology which is digital communication. But this also introduce some problems that interfere its privilege to the users. However, an army of a mobile phone and its clones from a systematized architecture entitled "Signal Explorer" will help on making data transmission better.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2018, with the theme of Transmission.
